label.description: Create a Quick Campaign
Welcome to the Create Quick Campaign Wizard
This wizard helps you create an activity and distribute it to multiple records at one time.

You can use this wizard to communicate directly with your customers, such as by sending email, or to assign activities to others to complete, such as making phone calls. Then, you can track the responses to these activities.
You will be asked to:
Specify the name of the quick campaign
Select an activity and who to assign the activity to
Specify the content for the activity
To continue, click Next.
Specify the Campaign Name
Specify the name for this Quick Campaign. The maximum number of characters is 200.
Select the Activity Type and Owners
Activity Type:
Select an activity and who to assign the activity to
Specify the Content of the Activity
Specify the details of the quick campaign by filling out the available fields in the activity. When you are done, click Next.
Specify the Content of the Activity
Specify the details of the quick campaign by filling out the available fields in the activity. When you are done, click Next.
All Day Event
Start Time
End Time
Specify the Content of the Activity
Specify the details of the quick campaign by filling out the available fields in the activity. When you are done, click Next.
Specify the Content of the Activity
Specify the details of the quick campaign by filling out the available fields in the activity. When you are done, click Next.
Specify the Content of the Activity
Specify the details of the quick campaign by filling out the available fields in the activity. When you are done, click Next.
Use Template
Completing the Create Quick Campaign Wizard
You have successfully completed the wizard. Review the information for your campaign. If you want to make changes, click Back.
After you create this quick campaign, it will be located in the Sales and Marketing pane, under Quick Campaigns.
To create the quick campaign and its activities, click Create.
